titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Slovkia
Slovkia

div.head: Legislation
div.p: A Freedom of Information Act abolished the previous 30 year rule. Subject to certain conditions, members of the public have a right to access all documents after submitting a written application.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Slovak Republic Department of the Archive and Documentation Hlboka cesta 2 833 36 Bratislava 37

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers must submit a written application to gain access to the Archives.
